author: jhl1908
title: Nice set, shame about the execution.
review:
I found it at a bargain price at the end of its toystore shelf life.

 

At first I was pleasant surprised by all the cool bricks and the control block with its sensor parts.

But I then I realised there was no way to build the model without having a computer running the software to show the instructions. NOT cool as the program was unable to run on my win98 computer. After I contacted the hotline I got the program running only to find it was annoyingly slow to build the model and not fun to use.

I truly lost my interest when the model was build and also found out there where no way to use it as a standalone model, but only with a computer running the problematic software.

A short time later I upgraded my computer and was afterwards unable to get the program up and running again.

 

As a whole to me it was a big disappointment if bought for the concept, but lots of great bricks to be used in other projects.
